g.title: Maryland Purple Line (light rail, under construction)
Shady Grove. Terminus of Red Line
Rockville. Transfer for Amtrak and Maryland Area Regional Commuter (MARC)
Free out-of-station transfer between Farragut North and Farragut West stations within 30 minutes using a SmarTrip card to exit and re-enter the opposite station.

use.title: Farragut North. Free out-of-station transfer to Farragut West station within 30 minutes using a SmarTrip card to exit and re-enter the opposite station.

g.title: Union Station. Transfer for Amtrak, Maryland Area Regional Commuter (MARC) and Virginia Railway Express (VRE)
Fort Totten. Terminus of Yellow Line (regular)
Silver Spring. Transfer for Maryland Area Regional Commuter (MARC)
Greenbelt. Terminus of Green Line. Transfer for Maryland Area Regional Commuter (MARC) and Maryland Metrobus route B30 for Baltimore–Washington International Airport (BWI)
College Park–U of Md. Transfer for Maryland Area Regional Commuter (MARC)
U Street / African American Civil War Memorial / Cardozo
L'Enfant Plaza. Transfer for Virginia Railway Express (VRE) and Virginia Metrobus route 5A for Dulles Airport (IAD)
Farragut West. Free out-of-station transfer to Farragut North station within 30 minutes using a SmarTrip card to exit and re-enter the opposite station.
Downtown Largo. Terminus of Silver Line and Blue Line
New Carrollton. Terminus of Orange Line and Purple Line. Transfer for Amtrak and Maryland Area Regional Commuter (MARC)

use.title: Wiehle–Reston East. Terminus of Silver Line

g.title: Crystal City. Transfer for Virginia Railway Express (VRE)
King Street–Old Town. Transfer for Virginia Railway Express (VRE) and Amtrak at Alexandria Union station
Franconia–Springfield. Terminus of Yellow Line (rush hour only) and Blue Line. Transfer for Virginia Railway Express (VRE)
Branch Avenue. Terminus of Green Line

g.text: Van Ness–University of the District of ColumbiaUDC
Foggy Bottom–George Washington UniversityGWU Kennedy Center
College Park–University of MarylandU of Md
U Street / African American Civil War Memorial / Cardozo
